docs.snippet: Franz Beckenbauer, who won World Cups with Germany as a player and coach, was suspended for refusing to cooperate with an investigation over bidding for the 2018 and 2022 tournaments....
docs.lead_paragraph: Franz Beckenbauer, who won World Cups with Germany as a player and coach, was suspended for refusing to cooperate with an investigation over bidding for the 2018 and 2022 tournaments.
docs.abstract: FIFA's ethics committee suspends Franz Beckenbauer from all soccer activity for 90 days, saying he had refused requests to cooperate with an investigation into bidding for the 2018 and 2022 World Cups.

headline.main: Franz Beckenbauer Barred by FIFA for 90 Days

docs.snippet: Former Pittsburgh Steelers coach Chuck Noll, who helped transform the team into one of the league's dominant franchises and became the only NFL coach to win four Super Bowl titles, has died at the age of 82, the National Football League said on Fr...
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Pittsburgh Steelers coach Chuck Noll, who helped transform the team into one of the league's dominant franchises and became the only NFL coach to win four Super Bowl titles, has died at the age of 82, the National Football League said on Friday.
